# Form Controls Component

Editable controls are a set of reusable AngularJS directives to build quickly and easily form fields that support custom layout, validation, error messages, two step edit, tootlips, help messages, hooks for saving etc.

## Dependencies

* JQuery
* ui.bootstrap

## References


* [Editable Controls WIKI](https://backbase.atlassian.net/wiki/display/LCD/Editable+Controls)
